amendment.description: Amendment provides funding for the Juvenile Deliquency Prevention Block Grant program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention Block Grant program by $5 million.

action.text: Amendment (A059) offered by Ms. E. B. Johnson.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson, E. B. amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.
